text:
Pakistan has set up a five-member Joint Investigation Team (JIT) to probe the terror attack on the Pathankot airbase, a week after it lodged an FIR over the assault without naming JeM chief Masood Azhar whom India has accused of having masterminded the strike.

The JIT, which was formed by the Punjab government on Thursday, is expected to visit India “shortly” to gather evidence if the Indian government gives it permission.

Earlier, a six-member Special Investigation Team was set up by the Federal government for the initial probe into the case based on the leads given by India.

A police official said the SIT would become dysfunctional once government formally transfers its powers to the JIT. — PTI
title: Pak. forms new team to probe Pathankot attack
